The `susieash` package combines the Sum of Single Effects regression model with adaptive shrinkage priors to improve FDR and Power in both sparse and oligogenic simulation settings. Currently, you can find three key sections on the website i) a list of general improvements to build upon the `susieR` package, ii) vignettes, and iii) results in both sparse and oligogenic simulation settings.
